section.heading: Green building priority.
section.text: Priority consideration for the District government’s facility needs shall be given to buildings fulfilling or exceeding the LEED-NC 2.2 standard or the LEED-CS 2.0 standard at the silver level. For purposes of this subsection, the terms “LEED-CS” and “LEED-NC” shall have the same meanings as provided in § 6-1451.01(28) and (30) [Repealed], respectively.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 1007 of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

Applicability of D.C. Law 24-306: § 4 of D.C. Law 24-306 provided that the change made to this section by § 3(b) of D.C. Law 24-306 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
